name: commutativity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of always giving the same result whatever order the values are in: The key properties that an algorithm must satisfy are those of commutativity and associativity. We have shown the reciprocal commutativity of these logical rules. Related word
commutativeOpposite
non-commutativity
More examplesFewer examplesThe principle of the commutativity of evidence states that the order in which evidence is acquired should not affect the meaning of that evidence.We found that there was no satisfactory proof of commutativity.The commutativity of the diagram is shown.
